examples.korean: The grass was wet with early morning dew. 발음듣기 풀은 이른 아침 이슬에 젖어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The grass was wet with early morning dew. 발음

examples.korean: There were cows grazing beside the river. 발음듣기 강가에서는 소들이 풀을 뜯고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There were cows grazing beside the river. 발음

examples.korean: The grass had withered in the warm sun. 발음듣기 풀들이 따뜻한 햇볕을 받아 시들어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The grass had withered in the warm sun. 발음

examples.korean: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook. 발음듣기 그는 그 사진들을 자기 스크랩북에 풀로 붙였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pasted the pictures into his scrapbook. 발음

examples.korean: The field had been grazed by sheep. 발음듣기 그 들판은 양이 풀을 다 뜯어먹은 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The field had been grazed by sheep. 발음
